DialogueOption.Text: Hey Tephra, got any new dirt for me before I take off?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?

Dialogue.Page: Wha? Really?! Where does it go?

DialogueOption.Text: It travels to a dark cave somewhere on Timber Hearth.
It travels to a sanctuary made to protect Hearthians from a supernova.

Dialogue.Page: Wow, you found it already?! You're awesome, astronaut!
But.. How do you get in the spooky cave it's hiding in? Galena and I want to get in so we can use it for playing hide and seek!
Galena and I looked all over Timber Hearth - even inside the zero-g cave! But we've never seen the purple rock inside any of these caves.
Oh..! There might be more caves around the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> outside the village, though! That's the one place we've never looked.

DialogueOption.Text: Huh. Where are the Nomai Ruins again?

Dialogue.Page: We wanted to look there too - but Mayor Rutile told us not to ever go near there, because there's lots of dangerous ghost matter around that area that we can't see.
So.. Could you look around the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> for us, astronaut? The purple rock might be going to a cave there that we don't know about!
Hornfels told me the astronauts' Little Scouts can take pictures and see where ghost matter is hiding..
If you use your Little Scout, I bet you'll be totally safe from the ghost matter!
Um.. I dunno! It's somewhere on Timber Hearth, outside the village?
I think I saw it before playing with Tektite's probe launcher, up the hill. Maybe you can try using Tektite's scout launcher to find it, astronaut!
Galena and I wanted to look there ourselves - but Mayor Rutile told us not to ever go near there, because there's lots of dangerous ghost matter around that area that we can't see.
Could you look around the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> for us, astronaut? The purple rock might be going to a cave there that we don't know about!
Hornfels told me the astronauts' Little Scouts can take pictures and see where ghost matter is hiding..
If you use your Little Scout, I bet you'll be totally safe from the ghost matter!
Um.. I dunno! It's somewhere on Timber Hearth, outside the village?
I think I saw it before playing with Tektite's probe launcher, up the hill. Maybe you can try using Tektite's scout launcher to find it, astronaut!
Woah, really? The supernova is something the sun does that the exhibit in the museum talks about, right?
Why would the Nomai build something like that? Is it just an emergency hiding spot in case that happens someday?
But if it is, why would they seal it up and hide it like that? There's no way to get in or out of there, heehee!
The Nomai are weeeird!
Wait, you're taking off today? Really?! I didn't know!
Aw, I'll.. I'll miss you, astronaut.
Um, I don't really have any new dirt on me.. Oh wait, I know!
There's a new champion of hide and seek in the village, if that's dirt to you!

DialogueOption.Text: Oh? Someone better at hiding than you or Galena? Who could that be?

Dialogue.Page: It's a 'what', not a 'who'!
It's that weird rock at the museum!
Um.. That's a really horrible joke to make, astronaut..
No, I'm talking about the weird rock outside the museum!
Yeah, the weird purple rock in the exhibit right outside the museum! It's so good at hiding!
Oh, I don't mean when it jumps behind you and scares you..
I mean when it disappears completely!
Galena and I both looked all over Timber Hearth to find where it goes when it disappears from that place. But neither of us ever found its <color=orange>super secret hiding spot!</color>
Maybe you can help us find where it goes, astronaut.
If you find it, that'd make you the best seeker in the village!
